About Us

{% comment %}
Special title treatment
{% endcomment %}

This website presents a modern solution to the problem faced by commercial farmers and seed packaging industries. For researchers studying seeds, determining the quality and performance of seeds is an essential task. Filtering out every single bad or damaged seed in commercial farming is a very tedious, time-consuming, and error-prone task. Hence, filtering the seeds in clusters can minimize this issue. This project outlines a method to improve the productivity of the seed production and seed packaging processes. Here we used a high-quality dataset that includes fine maize seeds and damaged maize seeds. By using CNN which is the Deep Learning technique , the system classifies an input image as Excellent, Good, Average, Bad, and Worst quality seed cluster. The Good and Excellent seed clusters (sometimes Average) can be further used for cultivation, and the Worst and Bad clusters can be rejected. Django framework is used to create the web application where the user can upload the image and test for quality and get the certification. {% comment %} Go somewhere {% endcomment %}
